name: Stranded On A Raft
description:
You're in a raft at the middle of the sea, you must expand your raft and fend off monsters who are going to destroy you and the raft. There's a lot of stuff you can do defend yourself such as crafting items and tools, building, and do some fishing and cooking to refresh your hunger.

The game is still in heavy development therefore more stuff will be added very soon.

Basic Controls
WASD - Player Movement
Space - Interact with fishing rod and spear
